name: Arian Khan
title: AI Engineer, AI Researcher, Full-Stack Developer, Robotics Engineer, Software Engineer, Embedded Systems Engineer
summary: Passionate about building AI-native systems that bridge human interaction and automation.

work_experience.title: AI developer
bullet_points: Developed LSTM Auto-Encoder anomaly detection model using PyTorch to predict equipment failures 2-4 weeks in advance, achieving 92% accuracy and reducing unplanned downtime by 35% across manufacturing facilities

Engineered comprehensive data analytics pipeline using Azure KQL to process 50,000+ real-time PLC sensor readings per minute, implementing automated filtering that improved data quality by 40% and reduced false alerts by 60%

Built full-stack monitoring dashboard with React frontend and .NET Core backend, featuring real-time data visualization, role-based authentication, and automated reporting for 150+ plant operators and maintenance technicians

Implemented advanced signal processing algorithms in MATLAB/Simulink for vibration analysis and spectral processing, improving sensor accuracy by 25% through custom filtering and noise reduction techniques

Programmed Siemens PLC systems using Ladder Logic for sensor integration and data acquisition, configuring I/O modules and communication protocols (Modbus, Ethernet/IP) while optimizing scan times by 30%
Engineered a multi-agent AI system that autonomously researches, synthesizes web data and internal company resources, and generates comprehensive engineering documentation
Automated end-to-end engineering document generation workflows using n8n, reducing manual processing time and standardizing output quality across technical documentation

work_experience.title: AI Engineer Intern
bullet_points: Developed a Duolingo-style AI system with a simple ANN-based classifier that analyzes user performance, detects weaknesses from incorrect answers, and dynamically recommends personalized financial literacy lessons through an adaptive feedback engine.
Engineered a conversational NLP assistant to engage users about financial literacy, leveraging Hugging Face Transformers and Ollama for local LLM deployment.
Fine-tuned Transformer models using parameter tuning and local optimization with Ollama to customize the assistant’s tone, accuracy, and response flow.

work_experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
bullet_points: Created a financial literacy app using Flutter and Dart aimed at educating 13-18-year-olds about financial concepts, implementing features such as login/registration, email verification, password recovery, and structured learning modules.
Developed interactive educational features within the app, including mini-games, quizzes, and engaging lessons, enhancing user engagement and retention through gamified learning experiences.

Designed and implemented responsive UI layouts using Flutter and Dart, optimizing for various screen sizes and devices; leveraged Canva to design visually appealing UI elements and create rough designs.

Built and integrated a backend system using Node.js and MongoDB, handling user registration, authentication, and data storage securely; collaborated with a team using Git and GitHub for version control.
Debugged and optimized app performance using Flutter DevTools, identifying and resolving bugs and rendering issues to enhance overall app responsiveness.

work_experience.title: Onsite Support
bullet_points: Installed and configured Sun Life software on new computers for onboarding employees, ensuring seamless functionality.
Upgraded old computers to new ones, including hardware upgrades with RAM replacements and software updates, enhancing efficiency and performance.
Provided technical support to Sun Life staff, effectively resolving complex computer issues and maintaining high levels of customer satisfaction.

personal_projects.title: AI Sports Commentary App (AI Full-Stack)
bullet_points: Designed and implemented a full-stack AI sports commentary system where users upload sports clips and receive dynamic commentary generated via OpenAI Whisper (for audio transcription) or PyTorch-based computer vision analysis when audio is unavailable.
Built a polished, responsive frontend using React and TypeScript, styled with Tailwind CSS and assisted by Lovable.dev.
Integrated video upload, clean UI components, and toast-based user feedback for a smooth UX.
Integrated Google Gemini via API to generate dramatic sports commentary, dynamically adapting prompts based on either transcribed speech or visual cues to produce realistic and energetic outputs.

personal_projects.title: Fantasy Draft (Web Dev)
bullet_points: Developed a full-stack basketball fantasy league featuring a real-time draft system, enhancing user engagement and competitive play.
Engineered a scalable backend with Node.js and Express, optimized PostgreSQL queries for efficient data handling, and built a dynamic frontend using EJS, Bootstrap and CSS.
Implemented secure authentication with Google OAuth and custom login/registration, ensuring robust user data protection.
Integrated external APIs to fetch and store player data in PostgreSQL, linking drafted players to users and seamlessly passing data between the backend and frontend.

personal_projects.title: Delivery Bot (Robotics)
bullet_points: The Delivery Bot offers an innovative solution to help individuals, especially the elderly, receive packages.
Created a robot that follows file instructions to reach locations on a grid, picks up colored boxes, and autonomously makes decisions based on box colors.
Developed a RobotC program that determines the robot's actions and tasks with the help of various sensors and motors, allowing it to make informed decisions about its next course of action.

personal_projects.title: Impact-Reducing Bumper System (Transportation Safety)
bullet_points: Designed and built a low-cost, impact-reducing bumper system that achieved a 50% reduction in collision force, leveraging accessible materials and engineering principles of energy dissipation to improve occupant and vehicle safety in low-speed crashes.

Developed a dynamic MATLAB simulation to model acceleration, velocity, and rebound behavior during multiple collisions, enabling data-driven optimization of impact absorption and overall structural performance.

Integrated transportation safety principles, vehicle dynamics, and GD&T standards to refine the bumper design, ensuring it met performance, reliability, and manufacturability criteria through iterative testing and analysis.
